title: Weaver's Thesis Book, Theorie des Etoffes Unies et Faconnees, ca. 1860
title_raw: Theorie des Etoffes Unies et Faconnees
medium: paper bound with buckram covered cardboard with suede back and corners, containing samples and mises-en-carte
dimensions: H: 4 x W: 29 x L: 44.3 cm
creditline: Museum purchase from Trustees' Book Appropriation
description: Uncompleted book written in delicate longhand labelled on title page; "Theorie des Etoffes Unies et Faconnees".  Contains 131 samples of fabrics, 99 mises-encarte, numerous sketches for heddle arrangements, technical drawings and descriptions of fabrics.

tombstone.epitaph: Weaver's Thesis Book, Theorie des Etoffes Unies et Faconnees, ca. 1860. paper bound with buckram covered cardboard with suede back and corners, containing samples and mises-en-carte. Museum purchase from Trustees' Book Appropriation. 1939-40-4.
